ygData.subject: Re: Spell Components
ygData.msgSnippet: No, runes are a vital part of Wizard Research Spells.  The books only provide the ingredients required to make the spell. Valacian - 20th Level Erudite Wizard,
ygData.messageBody:
No, runes are a vital part of Wizard Research Spells. The books only provide the ingredients required to make the spell.

Valacian - 20th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: Neil Lambert [SMTP:smartass@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 7:46 PM
To: EQ_Wizards
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Spell Components

i think you're wrong. wizards have nothing to do with runes. Either the enchanter or the magician have spells that are called Runes. those are logically the ones that use runes for research. i think wizards use books.

I am probably wrong, so please correct me
<< File: ATT00001.htm >>
